name: Evil Assault
effectText: Discard 1 card; take 1 Level 4 or lower "Evil HERO" monster from your Deck and either add it to your hand or Special Summon it, also for the rest of this turn after this card resolves, you cannot Special Summon from the Extra Deck, except "HERO" monsters. If this card is in your GY, except the turn it was sent there: You can banish this card from your GY; add 1 "Dark Fusion" from your GY to your hand. You can only use each effect of "Evil Assault" once per turn.
